onboarding_subtitle: Choose your path to get started
onboarding_option_learner_description: Browse and purchase learning decks from publishers. Build your knowledge library and track your progress.
onboarding_option_publisher_description: Create and sell learning decks. Manage your content, set pricing, and reach learners around the world.
onboarding_error_not_authenticated: You must be signed in to create a profile.
onboarding_error_profile_exists: A profile already exists for this account.
onboarding_error_invalid_usertype: Invalid user type. Please select either learner or publisher.
onboarding_error_server: Failed to create profile. Please try again later.
onboarding_error_unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
settings_no_profile: No profile found. Please complete onboarding first.
settings_display_name_too_long: Display name must be 100 characters or less
settings_email_readonly: Email is managed by your authentication provider
settings_avatar_readonly: Avatar is managed by your authentication provider
